entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening. Snow beginning in the evening. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming north 20 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
